
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2024-03-31 16:12:02.414590                #
######################################


#legion #leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_defence_engineer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_fleet_organizer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_politician_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_politician_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_politician_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_politician_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_politician_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_politician_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_skirmisher_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_skirmisher_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_skirmisher_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_skirmisher }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_skirmisher_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_skirmisher_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_skirmisher_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_skirmisher_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_skirmisher_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_battleship_focus #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_battleship_focus_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_battleship_focus } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_technology = tech_battleships
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_battleship_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_battleship_focus
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_battleship_focus_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_battleship_focus }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_battleship_focus
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_battleship_focus
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {

		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes

		}
	}

#legion #trait_ruler_charismatic_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_charismatic_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_charismatic_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_charismatic }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_charismatic_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_charismatic_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_charismatic_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_charismatic_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_charismatic_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_corvette_focus #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_corvette_focus_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_corvette_focus } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_technology = tech_destroyers
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_corvette_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_corvette_focus
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_corvette_focus_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_corvette_focus }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_corvette_focus
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_corvette_focus
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_cruiser_focus #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_cruiser_focus_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_technology = tech_cruisers
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_cruiser_focus_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_cruiser_focus
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_cruiser_focus
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_destroyer_focus #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_destroyer_focus_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_technology = tech_destroyers
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_destroyer_focus_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_destroyer_focus
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_destroyer_focus
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_eye_for_talent_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_feedback_loop }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}

		}
	}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_warlike_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_warlike_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_warlike }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_warlike_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_warlike_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_trait_ruler_warlike_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_warlike_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}

#legion #leader_trait_armada_logistician_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armada_logistician_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_armada_logistician }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_armada_logistician_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_armada_logistician_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

#legion #leader_trait_home_guard_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_home_guard_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_home_guard }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_home_guard_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_home_guard_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_home_guard_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_intimidator_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_intimidator_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_intimidator }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_intimidator_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_intimidator_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}

		}

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_fortifier }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_fortifier_3

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_from_the_ranks_3 }

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_armorer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_armorer
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

		}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_maven_of_war #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_maven_of_war_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_maven_of_war
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_maven_of_war_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_maven_of_war
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_maven_of_war
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_military_overseer #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_military_overseer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_military_overseer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_military_overseer
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_military_overseer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_military_overseer
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_military_overseer
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#legion #leader_trait_peacekeeper #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_peacekeeper_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
	}
	allow = {
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { SUBCLASS = subclass_commander_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_peacekeeper
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_legion_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}
